name: Alien Star Menace (itch)
description:
The starship Paladin is under attack! 

Aliens have invaded, and they don't seem interested in making friends.

Use your wits and your weapons to help your shipmates overcome the intruding menace. Unlock new units, master their abilities, and drive the alien scum off your ship! Don't get cozy, or you could be a meal for a giant space ogre.

FEATURES

  • Challenging levels that will test your skills
  • Fast-paced combat that will keep you on your toes
  • Lots of units to unlock and play with
  • A quirky, light-hearted storyline
